```{r destroythistag, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
if(class(table) != "list") {
  table = list(table)
}

if (is.null(table_name)) {
  table_name = rep("Untitled",length(table))
}

if (is.null(table_note)) {
  table_note = rep(" ", length(table))
}

for (i in seq_along(table)) {
  cat("\n\n")
  cat("\n\n")
  
  if ("indent_" %in% names(table[[i]])) {
    stub_indents = list(table[[i]]$indent_)
    table[[i]]$indent_ = NULL
  } else{
    stub_indents = NULL
  }
  cat(paste0("Table ", i))
  cat(
    papaja::apa_table(
      table[i],
      caption = table_name[i],
      stub_indents = stub_indents ,
      note = table_note[i],
      escape = F
    )
  )
  
  cat("<br />")
  

}
```
